name: Super Extreme BumperCar Racing
description:
This is my attempt at a soul successor to F Zero X for the N64, Its currently in internal app tests on the Google play app store, if you are an android user check out my other app games on the play store search "bobnfriends" rocky mcboldpants is a thrill.

if you love F Zero X as much as I do try out this fast paced racing game and leave a donation, if I get support for this project I will consider upgrading the graphics, adding more content, etc. Its compatible with touch screens/keyboard/gamepad (xbox controller is the best imo)

Also by all means tell me if there's a problem downloading or something, Im new to Itch, so let me know!
